_header: Saint Matthew the Evangelist / telleth us that Jesu Christ
Note: For the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 981.
_description: Gospel for the Twenty-second Sunday after Trinity in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
ffor ellis tyne we heuene blisseIf we forgiue oure broþer
                    lethe…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Bakbytars what pyne þai drieBot þai amende
                    þaim or þai die
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Matheu þe EwangelistTelleþ vs þat Ihesu
                    crist…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…What pyne þe Bacbiter schal dryeBut he a mende him or he
                    dye
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Simile est Regnum celorum homini Regi (f.
                    213ra)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Matheu þe euangelistTelles vs þat ihesu
                    crist…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…What payne þe bakbitere sale drygheBot he amende him or
                    he dyghe

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt mathew þe Euangelisttelliþ vs þat ihesu
                    crist…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…What pyne þe bakbitere schal dryeBut he amend him or he
                    dye
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Dominica vicesima Secunda post festum sancte teinitatis Euangelium
                        secundum Mathium (f. 206)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Seynt Matheu euangelystTelles vs þat ihesu
                    cryst…
CULGg531.Last Lines:

                    þai dye

dominica xxiia post trinitatem seundum matheum (f.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynte mathew þe euangelisteTelles vs at àhesu crystea
                    tale till his disciples talde…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…What pyne þe backbytter sall drebot he a mende hym or he
                    de
